title: Gnudi with arrabiata sauce
description: Gnudi are a type of gnocchi made with ricotta and a sprinkling of Parmesan for flavour. They need to be left in the fridge for at least eight hours before cooking.
ingredients: 2 garlic cloves, very finely chopped or crushed
500g/1lb 2oz fresh tomatoes, peeled and puréed (or tinned equivalent)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
